Thanks, Barbara and Tiffany, for pointing out the areas of 
jurisdiction of the Shinsengumi. One last question: who comes next in 
the heirarchy after Kondou and Hijikata? Should these two be away,who 
do they leave to take charge of things?

Many thanks!

Nana
